QuestData.Title: Pool of Visions
QuestData.Description: A terrible storm gathers on the horizon, $c.$B$BI have prepared a ritual. You must consult the pool to see what destiny holds for us all.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Farseer Drek'Thar at the Pool of Visions to begin the ritual of vision.
QuestData.RewardText: This Iron Tide threatens to sweep over all of Draenor.$B$BThe pool has shown you a possible future. This vision of the Frostwolf clan's destruction must not be allowed to come to pass.$B$BYou must stop it, $n.
